1.title: Dark Days
1.plot: Nick Barnes, a college student, tries to escape from his school during the midst of a widespread zombie outbreak that reaches his area.

2.title: The Group
2.plot: After narrowly escaping his zombie infested school, Nick runs into a group of survivors in the woods and decides to join up with them. He learns the truth about the severity of the outbreak and is given a place to stay at their house.

3.title: Hope
3.plot: Nick and the others find themselves torn between staying at the house or leaving after hearing a radio broadcast promising of a place of sanctuary. And an unknown character is still on the run from pursuing zombies.

4.title: The Horde
4.plot: Nick and the others meet a stranger named Bobby who makes it to the house and tells them that a horde of zombies were chasing him and are not far behind. Seth searches for Vince while Nick and the others secure the house.

5.title: Despair
5.plot: Nick and Kaitlyn get split up from the others. They fight to stay alive in the woods and outrun the pursuing zombies, trying to regroup with the others. Meanwhile, the others deal with an increasingly hostile Vince.

6.title: Silver Lining
6.plot: Nick and the group decide to settle down for the night in the woods. Seth and Kaitlyn search for food as the others prepare camp. After an unsuccessful hunt and desperation setting in, they meet a kind stranger who offers them shelter.

7.title: Returning the Favor
7.plot: Nick and the group try to earn their keep at the Dickinson's farm. Nick and Seth learn about a rival group from the city that have been victimizing Jed's family. They plan to kill their leader and run them out of the woods.

8.title: The Painful Truth
8.plot: Kaitlyn is kidnapped by the urbanites. Nick and the group go back to rescue her. They learn the truth about the Dickinson's from Douglas and team up with the urbanites to go negotiate with the family.

9.title: Broken
9.plot: The group and the urbanites battle and kill the Dickinsons. After escaping the farm, the group get into a standoff and are forced to take on a new member. Nearing the base, they are kidnapped by a group of outlaws posing as soldiers.

10.title: Prey
10.plot: Nick and the group try to escape from the outlaws after being held prisoner in an abandoned part of the base. They are aided by Myra who proves her loyalty to the group.

11.title: Solace
11.plot: Nick and the group recoup after eliminating the deserters with help from Myra. After a long journey they finally reach the base or what is left of it before running into more trouble.

12.title: Reality
12.plot: Nick and the group fight off endless waves of zombies after an automated siren attracts them to the base. After trapping the zombies out front, they find a vehicle in back and try to get it running and make a daring escape.

imdb.plot outline: The series follows Nick Barnes, a college student who must try and survive during a widespread zombie outbreak. He runs into a group of survivors along the way and proves himself worthy by saving one of them. He decides to join up for protection and to learn just how to stay alive. The members of the group are Seth, Vince, Diane and Kaitlyn. Each character either helps or hinders the integrity of the group throughout the series. A major turning point in the series come when the group agrees to make it their goal to venture to a military base in the hopes that they will find refuge from this nightmare after hearing an emergency radio broadcast. Nick and the group can only hope the message is right. There are other supporting characters the group come in contact with that join them: Bobby Lee (a store clerk) and Myra Kilburn (an escaped psychotic). They both prove to be very helpful in their own ways to the group when they encounter insidious adversaries during their journey. These foes include a cannibal family, an outlaw group, bandits, sick hillbillies, and not to mention the endless zombie threat.

The series is about Nick Barnes, a college student who must try and survive during a zombie outbreak. He runs into a group of survivors along the way proving himself worthy by saving one of them. He decides to join up for protection and to learn from key members of the group just how to stay alive. The members are Seth, Vince, Diane and Kaitlyn. Each character either helps or hinders the integrity of the group throughout the series.::Nicholas Ummarino
